name: North (itch) (aimd)
description:
Help Nim collect egg artifacts in this charming arctic sledding action game.

This game was made in 5 days for the 2020 Unreal Spring Game Jam.

Team:

  • Aim Diab (Solo)

Controls:

  • WASD for movement
  • SPACE to jump
  • MOUSE to rotate camera
  • E to start/stop sledding
  • R to reset to spawn zone
  • ESCAPE to exit the game
